headline: Australia's Afterpay says some BNPL users told to close accounts, then sold credit cards
summary: Some customers ofAustralia's Afterpay have been asked to close buy-now-pay-lateraccounts to qualify for a mortgage and offered a credit cardupon qualification, the BNPL provider said on...
